title: Planeao
shortDescription: A custom-built workspace for planning, organizing, and productivity tools.
longDescription: Planeao is a personal productivity platform I built from scratch, tailored specifically to how I like to plan and organize my life. I'm constantly developing and adding new tools that fit my daily workflow. Feel free to exploreâ€”if any of these tools happen to help you out as well, I'm always glad to share!

title: Dialofy - Easy Dialogue System
shortDescription: Add interactive dialogue to your game in minutes.
longDescription: Create interactive, branching dialogue fast. No coding. Node-based editor. Customizable UI. Supports multi-language & AI-generated dialogue (coming soon). Ideal for RPGs, narratives, and more.

title: Trap Night
shortDescription: Trap Night is a rhythmic video game where you must tap on the little figures at the precise moment to rap and thus defeat your opponents.
